rooms.description: This is room one. It's the first best room.
This is room two. This is the second best room.

monsters.name: Gogolithic Mass
monsters.description:
This small, dark animal is an ancient, primordial evil that has risen from the abyss of twenty seven centuries. 
 The bane of cleanliness, this beast is a force to be reckoned with.

monsters.name: The Nameless One
monsters.description:
This omniscient entity will never give you up, never let you down, and never run around and desert you. 
 In addition, it will never make you cry, never say goodbye, and never tell a lie or hurt you.

monsters.name: The Heart of Darkness
monsters.description:
This antediluvian evil will stop at nothing to purge humanity from the earth. 
 It is our father and mother, alpha and omega, creator and destroyer.

items.name: Iron Sword
items.description: A sturdy, well balanced sword with light rusting. Average sharpness.

items.name: Steel Sword
items.description: A sturdy, well balanced sword in pristine condition. Considerable sharpness.

items.name: Coins
items.description: A weighty bag of shiny, golden coins. Just looking at it makes you happy.

items.name: Fire Wand
items.description: A strange rod made of iron with a ruby at the tip. It radiates warmth and possesses the power of immolation.
